title: Did David Hogg lie about being on campus during the mass shooting?
subtitle: The conspiracy theorists used an out-of-context clip to raise "questions" about a statement made by Parkland, Florida.
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: The student of Mariory Stoneman Douglas, David Hogg, was arrested lying about being on campus during a school shooting in February 2018, when CBS said he had to get his bike and ride to school.
